text: Rimella is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Vercelli in the Italian region of Piedmont. It is about northeast of Turin and about northwest of Vercelli. Rimella is next to these municipalities: Bannio Anzino, Calasca- Castiglione, Cravagliana, Fobello, and Valstrona. == References == Category:Settlements in Vercelli
title: Rimella
